metrics module¶

metrics.auc_score(y_true, y_pred)¶

Gets the auc score of labels and predictions.

Parameters

  • y_true (torch.tensor) – The true labels.

  • y_pred (torch.tensor) – The prediction.

Returns

The auc score.

Return type

numpy.ndarray

metrics.binary_balanced_accuracy(y_true, y_pred)¶

Gets the binary balanced accuracy of labels and predictions.

Parameters

  • y_true (torch.tensor) – The true labels.

  • y_pred (torch.tensor) – The prediction.

Returns

The binary balanced accuracy.

Return type

numpy.ndarray

metrics.classif_accuracy(labels, preds)¶

Gets the percentage of correct classified predictions.

Parameters

  • labels (torch.tensor) – The true labels.

  • preds (torch.tensor) – The prediction.

Returns

Percentage of correct classified labels.

Return type

float

metrics.prepare_values(y_true, y_pred)¶

Converts the input values to numpy.ndarray.

Parameters

  • y_true (torch.tensor) – Either a CPU or GPU tensor.

  • y_pred (torch.tensor) – Either a CPU or GPU tensor.

Returns

y_true, y_pred – Numpy.ndarray of the input tensor data.

Return type

numpy.ndarray

metrics.regression_accuracy(labels, preds)¶

Gets the regression accuracy.

Notes

label values have to be in range [0,1]

Parameters

  • labels (torch.tensor) – The true labels.

  • preds (torch.tensor) – The prediction.

Returns

Regression accuracy.

Return type

float

metrics.sensitivity(y_true, y_pred)¶

Gets the sensitivity of labels and predictions.

Parameters

  • y_true (torch.tensor) – The true labels.

  • y_pred (torch.tensor) – The prediction.

Returns

The sensitivity.

Return type

numpy.ndarray

metrics.specificity(y_true, y_pred)¶

Gets the specificity of labels and predictions.

Parameters

  • y_true (torch.tensor) – The true labels.

  • y_pred (torch.tensor) – The prediction.

Returns

The specificity.

Return type

numpy.ndarray

nitorch
